Perl 5 6 Coming Soon

22 Jul 1999

Big changes coming in perl. Most obviously, the versioning numbers are changing. What was to be 5.006 will be 5.6.

The juicy stuff can be found in a Gurusamy Sarathy and Dick Hardt of ActiveState interview.

There's all kinds of cool stuff coming - improved threading, some really funky regex stuff, work being done on providing an event loop (fun for the non-web perl programmers), much finer control of lexical warnings - and more.
